name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior ML Engineer with 13+ years of experience specializing in **Python**, **ML**, **NLP**, and **Generative AI** technologies. Proven expertise in building scalable systems utilizing **AWS**, **GCP**, and **Azure** for cloud-native deployments, as well as containerization using **Docker** and orchestration with **Kubernetes**. Skilled in creating embedding pipelines and using vector databases to enhance AI-driven solutions.
Demonstrated ability to implement **Terraform** and **CDK** for infrastructure as code and proficient in leveraging **Elastic Stack** for data analysis and visualization.
Experienced in delivering high-performance applications in compliance-driven environments, with a strong focus on security and collaboration. Adept at using state-of-the-art frameworks and tools such as **FastAPI**, **Django**, and ML frameworks that drive predictive analytics and automate workflows. Strong background in MLOps, including model training and orchestration with **MLflow** and **Airflow**.
